main event: Eyewitnesses reported a sighting of a brilliant red 'telephone pole' shaped object flying over Galena, Illinois on 3rd February 1951. The object was described as 300' long and moving at a relatively slow speed.
interesting points: The mayor of Galena, Roy Logan, received calls from multiple reputable witnesses claiming to have seen the object, indicating the credibility of the sightings.
The object was described as resembling a 'telephone pole' and was reported to be noiseless and moving very fast.
Eyewitnesses in the northern Illinois town reported similar sightings, and there were observations of brilliant blue flashes believed to be caused by a meteor over central Wisconsin.
The police department conducted investigations into the reports but could not find a satisfactory explanation for the sightings of the 'saucers' or 'flying objects'.
The lack of a photograph and the similarity of the sightings by multiple credible witnesses make this an intriguing and unexplained event.
